metadata.title: CVE-2017-11462 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: Double free vulnerability in MIT Kerberos 5 (aka krb5) allows attackers to have unspecified impact via vectors involving automatic deletion of security contexts on error. It was discovered that Kerberos incorrectly handled deletion of security contexts. An attacker could possibly use this issue to cause a denial of service or other unspecified impact.

criterions.comment: krb5 package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.15.2-1').
